Name: Ember Jewel
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Magby, Magmar, and Magmortar.  Swap a Magby Claw and a Magby Card for an Ember Jewel at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
